title: UNDEROATH
content:
A friend of mine wants a vinyl Underoath sticker for his car. Any body know what font this is???

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020155618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/litsos_6388.jpg)
author: Renasci

comments.content:
hey, i don't know the type, but a quick google found out that this guy did the art: [http://www.jordanbutcher.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020155618/http:/www.jordanbutcher.com/ "http://www.jordanbutcher.com/") he might be able to tell you...  
cheers

ok, without even delibrity looking for this i found it... i was over at the Type Trust, just going through their catalogue and i found this:

[http://www.typetrust.com/font/vandermark/weights](http://web.archive.org/web/20111020155618/http:/www.typetrust.com/font/vandermark/weights "http://www.typetrust.com/font/vandermark/weights")

and it matches! except for the line through the O it's the same!

i hope this helps... - sye :)
Actually, that's the stock Oslash too. Nice to see Vandermark in the wild. Thanks Sye!
